div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1732 Egypt, 1910 (372) Burial: c. 19 A.D. (Jenkins) Contents: 198 AR Ptolemy II: 1 tetradr. Cleopatra VII: 61 tetradr. Tiberius: 136 tetradr. (Alexandreia, yr. 7) Disposition: Oxford 15 (Roman) Milne, NC 1910, pp. 333-9, pl. 10 ("Ptolemy XIII" = Cleopatra)
